name: Posthog PagerDuty plugin
description: Create PagerDuty incidents when a posthog query crosses a threshold

config.markdown:
Configure when to alert.

Every minute plugin will fetch the trends graph and alert based on comparing to threshold

config.hint: Go to insights -> trends and construct your graph, copy the URL here
config.name: PostHog Trend URL
Comparison operation
config.hint: If ≤ plugin alerts if $last_2_datapoints ≤ $threshold, otherwise if $last_2_datapoints ≥ $threshold
Your Personal API Key is not the same as the Project API key
config.name: PostHog API Key

config.hint: The ID of the current project, which can be found in Project settings
config.name: PostHog Project ID

config.hint: Integration Key for an integration on a service or on a global ruleset (Events API v2)
config.name: PagerDuty integration key

config.hint: Used in incident report as source
config.name: PagerDuty incident source
